Title: Relates to requiring utility companies maintain a toll free number for reporting service outages
Summary: Requires utility companies maintain a toll free number for consumers to call to report service outages which shall be made available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
LawCode: Add ยง119-d, Pub Serv L; add ยง1020-mm, Pub Auth L; add ยง399-yyyy, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, the public authorities law and the general business law, in relation to requiring utility companies maintain a toll free number for reporting service outages
